title.text: Security Update for Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2 on Windows Embedded 8 standard for x64 (KB3122655)

description.text: A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
